snippet: American and Pakistani officials have said that a doctor, Shakil Afridi, ran a vaccination program where Bin Laden was living, in an effort to obtain a DNA sample from him.
lead_paragraph: American and Pakistani officials have said that a doctor, Shakil Afridi, ran a vaccination program where Bin Laden was living, in an effort to obtain a DNA sample from him.

headline.main: Pakistan: Doctor Who Aided C.I.A. Should Face Charges, Panel Says
headline.seo: Pakistan: Doctor Who Aided C.I.A. Should Face Charges
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Doctor Who Aided C.I.A. Should Face Charges, Panel Says
